resources.string:
Email me if you want to be notified of updates.


See the code for the version history.


This app is demonstrates the UberColorPickerDialog class I created, derived from the ColorPickerDialog example in the API Demos. Any developers who would like to use or modify this class for their own applications can obtain it at http://keithwiley.com/Downloads/AndroidUberColorPickerDemo.zip.


Thank you.


111119
